title: duos.
body:
Why is it that every single duo sucks and feeds. seriously dudes, if you and another dude that sucks duo, it doesnt make you win. STOP GOING DUO WITH BADS IF YOU ARE BAD YOURSELF.


rantover.

replies.body:
The whole concept of different rankings lends to the idea that there exist different skills levels.
Every level 30 play has the right to see where they measure up in this skill level. 

Also being bad is relative, without them you wouldn't be able to validate yourself as a "good" player.

> The whole concept of different rankings lends to the idea that there exist different skills levels.
> Every level 30 play has the right to see where they measure up in this skill level. 
> 
> Also being bad is relative, without them you wouldn't be able to validate yourself as a "good" player.

im just saying, i have not seen a duo win a lane for a very long time. they call duo bot then.. yea. whats the point of calling duo bot if you are clueless to how to play bot.

Just becasue you are duo, you do not have to go bot. is what i mean.

I agree that being duo, should not imply bot lane. 
Both in that, they should not feel obligated to bot, nor should they be automatically given it. 

As a support main I find it very frustrating to get "forced" out of my role only to have them both feed. 
Only thing you can do it respect the pick order. If you are a higher pick, you have the right to take one of their roles. 
May not be great for team co-operation, but you do have the right as a higher pick, to pick your role first.
yup, thats what i mean. i main support too, i was ( OCE Support ) but name changed back to my original name
